name: jellyplex-watched
description: Sync watched state between Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby

variables.name: DRYRUN
variables.description: Do not mark any shows/movies as played and instead just output to log if they would of been marked. Change this to False after confirming that everything works as expected.

variables.name: DEBUG
variables.description: Print additional logging information

variables.name: DEBUG_LEVEL
variables.description: Debugging level, 'info' is default, 'debug' is more verbose

variables.name: RUN_ONLY_ONCE
variables.description: If set to True then the script will only run once and then exit

variables.name: SLEEP_DURATION
variables.description: How often to run the script in seconds

variables.name: LOG_FILE
variables.description: Log file where all output will be written to

variables.name: MARK_FILE
variables.description: Mark file where all shows/movies that have been marked as played will be written to

variables.name: REQUEST_TIMEOUT
variables.description: Timeout for requests for Jellyfin and Emby in seconds

variables.name: GENERATE_GUIDS
variables.description: Generating guids is a slow process, so setting this to False is a way to speed up the process by using the location only, useful when using same files on multiple servers

variables.name: GENERATE_LOCATIONS
variables.description: Generating locations is a slow process, so setting this to False is a way to speed up the process by using the guid only, useful when using different files on multiple servers

variables.name: MAX_THREADS
variables.description: Max threads for processing

variables.name: USER_MAPPING
variables.description: Map usernames between servers in the event that they are different. Syntax: JSON map.

variables.name: LIBRARY_MAPPING
variables.description: Map libraries between servers in the event that they are different. Syntax: JSON map.

variables.name: BLACKLIST_LIBRARY
variables.description: Blacklist libraries that should be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

variables.name: WHITELIST_LIBRARY
variables.description: Whitelist libraries, everything not listed will be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

variables.name: BLACKLIST_LIBRARY_TYPE
variables.description: Blacklist library types such as Movies/TV Shows that should be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

variables.name: WHITELIST_LIBRARY_TYPE
variables.description: Whitelist library types such as Movies/TV Shows, everything not listed will be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

variables.name: BLACKLIST_USERS
variables.description: Blacklist users that should be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

variables.name: WHITELIST_USERS
variables.description: Whitelist users, each user not listed will be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

variables.name: PLEX_BASEURL
variables.description: URL of the plex server, use hostname or IP address if the hostname is not resolving correctly. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

variables.name: PLEX_TOKEN
variables.description: Recommended over username/password. Token is faster to connect as it is direct to the server instead of going through the plex servers. See: https://support.plex.tv/articles/204059436-finding-an-authentication-token-x-plex-token/ Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

variables.name: PLEX_SERVERNAME
variables.description: Recommend using PLEX_TOKEN instead. If not using plex token then use username and password of the server admin along with the servername. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

variables.name: PLEX_USERNAME
variables.description: Recommend using PLEX_TOKEN instead. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

variables.name: PLEX_PASSWORD
variables.description: Recommend using PLEX_TOKEN instead. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

variables.name: Plex: SSL_BYPASS
variables.description: Skip hostname validation for ssl certificates. Set to True if running into ssl certificate errors. Currently only applies to Plex.

variables.name: JELLYFIN_BASEURL
variables.description: Jellyfin server URL, use hostname or IP address if the hostname is not resolving correctly. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

variables.name: JELLYFIN_TOKEN
variables.description: Jellyfin api token, created manually by logging in to the jellyfin server admin dashboard and creating an api key. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

variables.name: EMBY_BASEURL
variables.description: Emby server URL, use hostname or IP address if the hostname is not resolving correctly. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

variables.name: EMBY_TOKEN
variables.description: Emby api token, created manually by logging in to the Emby server admin dashboard and creating an api key. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers
